__e: Maybe that's where the wizard lives who operates this thing.
Arthur, he doesn't just have magic - there are those who say he is the greatest sorcerer ever to walk the earth.
All we need is a witch Who can help us find him.
Ok. We'll just find the wizard and get this over with.
Wait, think about it. If I was a warlock, and I wanted to hurt you, don't you think I would've done it the last time I was here?
He's a killer, a shape-shifter, and he's out there.
I am this earth's greatest wizard.
I'm certain your visit would help.
But I will tell you that there is one less witch in Salem since you left.
